title.narrative: Developing a more effective oil and gas sector in Mexico by improving health and safety standards

description.narrative: The project is designed to build capacity and with UK expertise improve the effectiveness of Mexico's Regulators on issues around major accident hazards in the energy sector. Improvement of health and safety standards in the offshore oil and gas (and the construction sector) in Mexico by March 2017. This will not only bring UK expertise and consultancy opportunities but will also improve the general business environment for UK businesses wishing to work in this crucial sector.
